scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated, holding the Christ Child on her lap. The Christ Child is reaching out towards a crowned female figure kneeling before them. This figure, dressed in a blue robe, holds a circular object with intricate designs. The background is a rich red tapestry with a repeating gold pattern. The figures are rendered with halos, indicating their sacred status. The Virgin Mary and Christ Child are seated on a wooden bench or throne.
scene_interpretation: The scene likely represents the Virgin and Child with a supplicant, possibly a queen or a saintly figure, seeking intercession or blessing. The crowned figure could represent a royal patron or a symbolic representation of the Church. The gesture of the Christ Child reaching out suggests an interaction or bestowal of grace.
